patterns.nextjs_structure: The dashboard uses Next.js 14 App Router with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and server components
patterns.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom configuration at tailwind.config.js
patterns.component_pattern: React functional components with TypeScript, organized in src/components/
patterns.api_pattern: Next.js API routes in app/api/ directory

existing_implementations.description: BlogAgent generates blog content (markdown) and saves to content-agents/output/blog/. Blog platform needs to either fetch from API or import markdown files.

platform_options: Next.js static site with Contentful/Sanity CMS
deployment_considerations.recommended: Next.js with Contentful or Sanity for easy content management and API integration
deployment_considerations.hosting: Vercel for Next.js (automatic deployments, edge functions, built-in analytics)
